snippet.title: Lies of P Full Presentation | gamescom 2022 Xbox Booth
snippet.description:
Learn more about Lies of P in this stage breakout from the Xbox Booth at gamescom 2022. The developers share more on the story of Lies of P and how Pinocchio inspired their world. We get to learn more about various gameplay mechanics and much more. Lies of P is scheduled to release in 2023.

#gamescom #xbox #liesofp #gaming 

Timestamps
0:00 Intro gamescom Trailer
2:55 Lies of P Interview
4:05 How Pinocchio was the inspiration
6:37 Deep Dive on Story of Lies of P
10:00 How Lying Impacts the Game
